## Mission

- Advance mechanics-first autonomy for non-road machinery.
- Build reliable simulation and digital twin workflows for real-world operations.
- Deliver practical, safe, and deployable solutions with industry partners.
- Connect modeling, data, and lifecycle thinking across design and operations.

---

## Research themes

- Multibody and hydraulic system modeling
- Sim-to-real workflows
- Data-driven surrogate models
- Human/environment modeling for safety
- Lifecycle/operations-focused digital twins

---

## Domains

Logistics, healthcare, forestry, construction, non-road mobile machinery.
